# Nafees Siddiqui - Bio

## Professional Summary

Nafees Siddiqui is an AI Engineer with extensive expertise in building intelligent systems, specializing in agentic AI, retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), and full-stack web development. He combines deep technical knowledge with practical implementation skills to create production-ready AI applications.

## Core Expertise

### Agentic AI
- Building autonomous AI agents with planning and reasoning capabilities
- Implementing multi-step workflows using LangGraph and LangChain
- Creating agents that can interact with tools, APIs, and external services
- Designing agentic systems for complex task automation

### RAG Systems
- Designing retrieval-augmented generation architectures
- Working with vector databases (Pinecone, Supabase, FAISS)
- Implementing semantic search and embedding generation
- Building document ingestion pipelines for PDF, MD, and DOCX files

- Working with vector databases (Pinecone, Supabase, FAISS)
- Implementing semantic search and embedding generation
- Building document ingestion pipelines for PDF, MD, and DOCX files
- Creating systems with source citations and context-aware responses

### Full-Stack Development
- Modern web development with Next.js, React, and TypeScript
- Building responsive, SEO-friendly applications
- Cloud deployment on Vercel, AWS, and other platforms
- Creating beautiful UIs with Tailwind CSS and Framer Motion

## Technical Skills

**Languages & Frameworks:**
- TypeScript, JavaScript, Python
- Next.js, React, Node.js
- LangChain, LangGraph
- FastAPI, Express

**AI & ML:**
- OpenAI GPT models
- Vector embeddings (OpenAI, Cohere)
- Vector databases (FAISS, Pinecone, Supabase)
- RAG architecture design

**Tools & Platforms:**
- Git, GitHub
- Vercel, AWS
- Docker
- VS Code, Cursor

## Projects

### RAG-Powered Portfolio Chatbot

- RAG architecture design

**Tools & Platforms:**
- Git, GitHub
- Vercel, AWS
- Docker
- VS Code, Cursor

## Projects

### RAG-Powered Portfolio Chatbot
A production-ready RAG system integrated into this portfolio website. Features document ingestion, vector embeddings, interactive chat interface, source citations, and recruiter mode for structured summaries.

### Agentic AI Workflow Engine
Built autonomous AI agents with planning capabilities, tool use, and multi-step reasoning. Integrated with external APIs and databases for real-world task automation.

### Vector Database Management System
Scalable system for managing embeddings, semantic search, and knowledge bases. Supports multiple vector DB backends with a unified API.

## Education & Background

Nafees has a strong foundation in computer science and AI, with hands-on experience building production systems. He stays current with the latest developments in AI and web technologies.

## Contact

For inquiries about projects, collaborations, or opportunities, please reach out through the contact page or chat with the AI assistant.

# Nafees Siddiqui - Bio

## Professional Summary

Nafees Siddiqui is a Machine Learning Engineer specializing in Agentic AI, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), classical ML, and deep learning. He has hands-on experience building production-grade AI workflows, automating analytical pipelines, and developing intelligent systems using modern ML frameworks. His work at Quantiphi spans multi-agent systems, data integrity automation, vector search pipelines, and real-world model deployment.

## Core Expertise

### Agentic AI
- Building autonomous agents with planning and reasoning
- Implementing multi-step workflows using LangChain, LangGraph, and LangSmith
- Developing tool-using agents for SQL analysis, anomaly detection, and insights generation
- Designing multi-agent architectures for end-to-end task automation

### RAG Systems
- Building high-quality retrieval-augmented generation pipelines
- Working with FAISS, Pinecone, and Supabase vector databases

### RAG Systems
- Building high-quality retrieval-augmented generation pipelines
- Working with FAISS, Pinecone, and Supabase vector databases
- Implementing semantic search, embedding generation, and chunking strategies
- Designing multi-format ingestion pipelines (PDF, DOCX, Markdown) with contextual grounding and source citation

### Machine Learning & Deep Learning
- Classification, regression, clustering, and time series modeling
- CNNs, LSTMs, Transformers, YOLO, and advanced computer vision
- NLP pipelines including tokenization, embeddings, and sequence modeling
- Model deployment using Flask, FastAPI, and cloud services

## Technical Skills

**Languages & Frameworks:**  
- Python, C++, C  
- TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras  
- Scikit-learn, YOLO, OpenCV  

**AI & ML:**  
- Classical ML, Deep Learning  
- NLP, Transformers  
- RAG systems, Vector Search  
- Model Evaluation & Optimization  

**Tools & Platforms:**  
- MySQL, Firebase  
- Git, GitHub

**Oct 2025 – Present | Bangalore**

- Built multi-agent systems for anomaly detection and SQL-based root-cause analysis

- Integrated secure Snowflake and APS2 pipelines, improving investigation workflows  

### Machine Learning Intern — Quantiphi  
**Jun 2025 – Oct 2025 | Bangalore**

- Designed preprocessing pipelines speeding up training by 30%  
- Improved model performance to 92% on imbalanced datasets  
- Deployed ML models into production APIs serving 5K+ daily requests

- Designed preprocessing pipelines speeding up training by 30%  
- Improved model performance to 92% on imbalanced datasets  
- Deployed ML models into production APIs serving 5K+ daily requests  
- Delivered 3+ production-ready ML systems based on cross-functional requirements  

## Projects

### SecurifyAI  
**YOLO, OpenCV, Firebase**

- Developed a zone-based CCTV intrusion detection system  
- Integrated real-time face recognition using Firebase Authentication  
- Built scalable surveillance logging using Firebase Realtime Database  
- Successfully handled 200+ simultaneous video streams with minimal latency  

### Image Forgery Detection  
**Deep Learning (CNN), Flask**

- Served CNN outputs via secure REST APIs used by 15+ fraud analysts
